mapper.insert: insert into t_store_google_place (place_id, store_seq, name, latitude, longitude, viewport_northeast_latitude, viewport_northeast_longitude, viewport_southwest_latitude, viewport_southwest_longitude, icon, icon_background_color, icon_mask_base_uri, reference, types, rating, price_level, user_ratings_total, vicinity, ins_dt, formatted_address) values (#{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storeSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewportNortheastLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewportNortheastLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewportSouthwestLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewportSouthwestLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconBackgroundColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iconMaskBaseUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priceLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userRatingsTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vicinity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{insDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{formattedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_store_google_place set store_seq = #{storeSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viewport_northeast_latitude = #{viewportNortheastLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viewport_northeast_longitude = #{viewportNortheastLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viewport_southwest_latitude = #{viewportSouthwestLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, viewport_southwest_longitude = #{viewportSouthwestLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_background_color = #{iconBackgroundColor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon_mask_base_uri = #{iconMaskBaseUri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reference = #{reference,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, types = #{types,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price_level = #{priceLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_ratings_total = #{userRatingsTotal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vicinity = #{vicinity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upt_dt = #{uptDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, formatted_address= #{formattedAddresss,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where place_id = #{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select place_id, store_seq, name, latitude, longitude, viewport_northeast_latitude, viewport_northeast_longitude, viewport_southwest_latitude, viewport_southwest_longitude, icon, icon_background_color, icon_mask_base_uri, reference, types, rating, price_level, user_ratings_total, vicinity, ins_dt, upt_dt, map_dt, formatted_address from t_store_google_place where place_id = #{placeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select place_id, store_seq, name, latitude, longitude, viewport_northeast_latitude, viewport_northeast_longitude, viewport_southwest_latitude, viewport_southwest_longitude, icon, icon_background_color, icon_mask_base_uri, reference, types, rating, price_level, user_ratings_total, vicinity, ins_dt, upt_dt, map_dt, formatted_address from t_store_google_place where name LIKE CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') and vicinity=#{vicinity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select place_id, store_seq, name, latitude, longitude, viewport_northeast_latitude, viewport_northeast_longitude, viewport_southwest_latitude, viewport_southwest_longitude, icon, icon_background_color, icon_mask_base_uri, reference, types, rating, price_level, user_ratings_total, vicinity, ins_dt, upt_dt, map_dt, formatted_address from t_store_google_place

select place_id, store_seq, name, latitude, longitude, viewport_northeast_latitude, viewport_northeast_longitude, viewport_southwest_latitude, viewport_southwest_longitude, icon, icon_background_color, icon_mask_base_uri, reference, types, rating, price_level, user_ratings_total, vicinity, ins_dt, upt_dt, map_dt, formatted_address from t_store_google_place where store_seq = 0
